product_name: Polarmax XTRdry Cotton Crew Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Cotton as a performance fabric? You better believe it. The Polarmax(R) XTRdry(TM) cotton crew top pairs soft cotton with high-performance finishes to help you feel your best while working hard. XTRdry technical cotton/spandex blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly, keeping your skin cool and comfortable even when you start to sweat. Flatlock seams minimize chafing and abrasion. Antimicrobial treatment helps reduce odors even after multiple wears. Closeout.
